statements.select:
WITH CTE (ID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , 1 AS Level FROM dbo.AARole AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
And AA.ID = #ParentID#
AND AA.ParentID IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(BB.HierID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , BB.Level + 1 AS Level FROM dbo.AARole AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.ID ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HierID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.RoleName , AA.ParentID , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, BB.HierID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN BB.Level > 1 THEN '▶' ELSE '' END + AA.RoleName AS HierName , BB.Level as RoleLevel
FROM dbo.AARole AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RoleName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.RoleName , AA.ParentID , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.AARole AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.AARole ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, RoleName, ParentID, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #RoleName#, #ParentID#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.AARole SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, RoleName = #RoleName# , ParentID = #ParentID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
